document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA PUBLIC RECORDS MANAGEMENT AMENDMENT ACT OF 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-235 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-559, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 1990, and December 18, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-318 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
